label: SearchIndexerIndexProjectionSelector
description: Description for what data to store in the designated search index.

fields.label: Mappings
fields.tooltip: Mappings for the projection, or which source should be mapped to which field in the target index.

fields.label: Parent Key Field Name
fields.tooltip: Name of the field in the search index to map the parent document's key value to. Must be a string field that is filterable and not the key field.

fields.label: Source Context
fields.tooltip: Source context for the projections. Represents the cardinality at which the document will be split into multiple sub documents.

fields.label: Target Index Name
fields.tooltip: Name of the search index to project to. Must have a key field with the 'keyword' analyzer set.
